aboutMe.passion: Welcome to my portfolio! My name is Yuri Almeida, and I'm a self-taught Full Stack Developer living in Toronto. I'm passionate by the full range of web development, but particularly fascinated by the Backend. I relish a good challenge and approach them with positivity and focus. Let's get in touch!
aboutMe.name: Yuri Almeida

intro.title: Hello, I'm Yuri Almeida!
intro.subtitle: A full-stack software developer based in Toronto, passionate about creating beautiful and functional web applications.

ownPortfolio.title: This Portfolio
ownPortfolio.description: A portfolio website to showcase my work, and a bit about me. Built with React, Next.js. It uses i18next for internationalization, and is hosted on Vercel.

Ymaa.title: My Movies!
Ymaa.description: A web app to search for movies and TV shows, and save them to favorites. Built with React, using the the Codux IDE, and fetching from the Movie Database API.

FlaToronto.title: Fla Toronto
FlaToronto.description: A web app for the supporters of Flamengo in Toronto. Built with React -- under construction.

eSports.title: Find your DUO
eSports.description: Lorem ipsum dolor amet you probably haven't heard of them bitters selvage listicle heirloom.

ContactMe.title: Get in Touch
ContactMe.getBackSoon: I'll get back to you soon.
